attributes.action: Mr Brown, please increase TAX heavily on 2nd homes, holiday homes & buy-to-let property therefore making more properties available for those who are trying to get their 1st foot on the property ladder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The way to stop property inflation is to make it expensive to own a second home.

It’s common sense!

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Second-Homes/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
